# Static Package Manager

**spm 3.0.0 还在开发中，请先使用 spm2**

- 源码 https://github.com/spmjs/spm/tree/2.x
- 站点 https://spmjs.org/

* [查看所有 issue](https://github.com/spmjs/spm/issues)
* [新建 issue](https://github.com/spmjs/spm/issues/new)
